txt.en: Your efforts to assist the Ikorbâni are noted among the people. To recognize your efforts, the leaders of the Shagâni at Iridír wish to honour you with a gift and thanks.
Reach Ally tier with the Ikorbâni
You have honoured your word to assist the Ikorbâni in their efforts to restore their lands. You should return to Kildûg at Iridír to receive a reward for your continued assistance.

'I am pleased that you are such a staunch supporter of our people. For too long we suffered and lost much of who we were as a people.

'Thanks to you and your efforts our culture will return. Please accept this gift.

'If you would like to see what else we offer speak with Nêkhur.'
Your standing among the Ikorbâni earns you a gift. Return to Kildûg at Iridír to claim your reward.
You have honoured your word to assist the Ikorbâni in their efforts to restore their lands. You should return to Kildûg at Iridír to receive a reward for your continued assistance.
Visit Kildûg at Iridír to claim a gift
